full_description:
MSI PRO 22XT 10M Core i5 10th Gen 8GB RAM 256GB SSD 21.5" FHD Touchscreen All-in-One PC

MSI PRO 22XT 10M 21.5" FHD All-in-One PC is powered by an Intel Core i5-10400 Processor (12M Cache, 2.90 GHz up to 4.30 GHz) and 8GB of 3200 MHz DDR4 RAM. This AIO offers you the performance and power you require to run your productivity programs. Thanks to the 250GB M.2 PCIe SSD, loading and booting speeds are quick. The integrated Intel UHD 630 graphics provide you with clear visuals for presenting and editing your next business presentation on the 21.5" Multi-Touch IPS display which features Full HD resolution. A full 10-finger touch offers a sensitive and smooth experience for users to enjoy the fastest response with the touch of a fingertip. Video chat with your colleagues using the external Full HD webcam and dual speakers. Wireless or a Gigabit Ethernet RJ45 LAN port cable connectivity options are available for connecting to the internet. Clear video calls are possible with an external Full HD 1080p webcam. Use the five USB Type-A ports or the USB Type-C port to attach peripherals like external drives or mice to speed up your productivity. Through Bluetooth 4.2, wireless accessories like headsets can be connected. Using the built-in Wi-Fi 5 or the Gigabit Ethernet connector, you can connect to a network wirelessly or with a strong connected connection. This All-in-One can be mounted to a wall for a more comfortable viewing experience thanks to its 100x100mm VESA mounting pattern. MSI PRO 22XT 10M comes with a USB keyboard and mouse. The operating system that is installed is Windows 11 Pro.

Buy MSI PRO 22XT 10M Core i5 10th Gen 21.5" FHD All-in-One PC from the best Computer Shop in BD

In Bangladesh, you can get the original MSI PRO 22XT 10M Core i5 10th Gen 21.5" FHD All-in-One PC from Star Tech. We have a large collection of the latest MSI AIO PC to purchase for your office. Order Online Or Visit your Nearest Star Tech Shop to get yours at the lowest price. The MSI PRO 22XT 10M All-in-One PC comes with 2 Years of warranty.

full_description:
MSI PRO AP241Z 5M Ryzen 5 5600G 8GB RAM 512GB SSD 24" FHD All-in-One PC

MSI PRO AP241Z 5M 24" FHD All-in-One PC is powered by an AMD Ryzen 5 5600G 6-Core processor with integrated AMD Radeon Vega 7 graphics and 8GB of 3200 MHz DDR4 RAM. This AIO offers you the performance and power you require to run your productivity programs. Thanks to the 512GB M.2 PCIe SSD, loading and booting speeds are quick. MSI PRO AP241Z 5M has a 23.8" display that features an IPS panel for wide viewing angles. The screen also has a Full HD 1920 x 1080 resolution and a 16:9 aspect ratio. The Full HD 1920 x 1080 resolution and matte surface of the 23.8" IPS display help to minimize glare. With the addition of MSI Anti-Flicker and Less Blue Light technologies, this AIO safeguards your eyes from extended computer use. Wireless or a Gigabit Ethernet RJ45 LAN port cable connectivity options are available for connecting to the internet. Clear video calls are possible with an external Full HD 1080p webcam. When not in use, you can remove the webcam. Connect accessories and peripherals using the USB Type-A ports. MSI PRO AP241Z 5M comes with a wireless keyboard and mouse. The operating system that is installed is Windows 11. The MSI PRO AP241Z 5M comes with 2 years warranty.
